snippet.title: Two dead in separate crashes
snippet.content: AN ELDERLY man has died after a serious crash at Emu Park, south of Yeppoon. Emergency services were called to the crash on Pattison St about 6.20am after a vehicle left the road and collided with a tree. Police have confirmed the 80-year-old male driver of the vehicle were declared dead at the scene. An 80-year-old woman, who was a passenger in the vehicle, was taken to Yeppoon Hospital with non-life threatening injuries. The Forensic Crash Unit is investigating the incident. Meanwhile. the Forensic Crash Unit is investigating a fatal crash on the Sunshine Coast. Just before 10am yesterday a motorcycle was travelling east on Peachester Road, reports. A four wheel drive travelling in the opposite direction was turning right onto Storrs Road when the two vehicles collided, killing the 61-year-old male motorcyclist. The driver of the four wheel drive was not physically injured during the crash. Police are now appealing for any witnesses or people who may have seen the red bike travelling on Peachester Rd prior to this incident to contact them. Originally published as
